audioText: Le grand-père dormira paisiblement dans son fauteuil après avoir raconté des histoires fascinantes à ses petits-enfants.
question: Who will sleep peacefully in his armchair after telling fascinating stories to grandchildren?
options: The tired teacher after a long day of classes
The storyteller from the local library program
The elderly neighbor who visits every weekend
explanation: The text states 'Le grand-père dormira paisiblement dans son fauteuil après avoir raconté des histoires fascinantes à ses petits-enfants.' - The grandfather will sleep peacefully in his armchair after having told fascinating stories to his grandchildren. 'Dormira' is the future tense 3rd person singular of 'dormir' (to sleep).
